scripts.integration-tests:backend-only: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration-tests.yml up testDB backend
scripts.start:all: npm start --prefix ./server & npm start --prefix ./client && npm run codegen --prefix ./client
scripts.publish-server:prod: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f ./server/Dockerfile.production ./server --no-cache -t bdeliencourt/greenmates-server:prod && docker push bdeliencourt/greenmates-server:prod
scripts.publish-client:prod: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f ./client/Dockerfile.production ./client --no-cache -t bdeliencourt/greenmates-client:prod && docker push bdeliencourt/greenmates-client:prod
scripts.publish-server:staging: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f ./server/Dockerfile.production ./server --no-cache -t bdeliencourt/greenmates-server:staging && docker push bdeliencourt/greenmates-server:staging
scripts.publish-client:staging: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f ./client/Dockerfile.production ./client --no-cache -t bdeliencourt/greenmates-client:staging && docker push bdeliencourt/greenmates-client:staging
